topic.shortdesc: Ship Drupal recipe, IDE integrations, company chat, conformance kit, federation, ROI routing, and HITL governance.

section.title: Objectives
section.p: Deliver enterprise-grade deployment: Drupal recipe for orchestration, Agent Studio integrations, company chat, conformance badging, federation, ROI routing, and HITL controls.

section.title: Key Artifacts
section.p: Drupal recipe and modules; IDE plugins and apps; chat gateway; conformance CLI and badges; federation router and sitemap extensions; cost-optimizer; review-gates UI; skills registry.

section.title: Implementation Notes
section.p: Support multi-tenant scoping and RBAC; log every action to audit; provide explainable routing tied to cost/quality KPIs; enable pre-warming vectors across dependent modules.

section.title: Governance
section.p: Define risk matrix and escalation paths. Require approvals for critical actions with durable signatures.

section.title: Acceptance
section.p: Orchestration from Drupal UI end-to-end; measurable cost reductions at equal quality; reproducible conformance reports; federation plans visible across projects.
